author: Paulo Cuento
title: Ex-champ Jon Jones officially reinstated to the UFC
text:
by Paulo Cuento
October 24, 2015 (updated)
Jon Jones photo by UFC
Former UFC light heavyweight champion Jon Jones has been reinstated to the UFC, ending his six-month suspension for his part in a hit-and-run accident which resulted to his arrest.
FOX Sports reported that the promotion announced the champ’s official comeback. However, a definite date for the return was still “pending.”
UFC earlier made an announcement that the former champ will be given a title shot upon his return to the promotion.
Jones expressed his gratitude by posting a message on his Facebook page.
The former champ was placed under indefinite suspension after being arrested. UFC then decided to strip him of his belt as part of the sanction imposed by the management.
